default: Baba Farid College of Engineering and Technology (BFCET) is a premier institute offering quality education.
BFCET is known for its excellent faculty, research facilities, and student success.

btech: B.Tech is a four-year undergraduate program at BFCET with specializations in various engineering fields.
Our B.Tech program includes courses in CSE, Mechanical, Civil, and AI & ML.
mtech: M.Tech is a two-year postgraduate program focusing on advanced engineering knowledge.
Our M.Tech program offers specializations in AI, Data Science, and more.
default: We offer B.Tech, M.Tech, and other specialized courses. Check our website for details.

btech: For B.Tech admissions, you need to pass 12th grade with PCM subjects and appear for entrance exams.
B.Tech admissions require fulfilling eligibility criteria and submitting necessary documents.
mtech: M.Tech admissions are based on GATE scores or equivalent entrance tests.
For M.Tech, you must have a relevant bachelor's degree in engineering.
default: Admissions are open for various courses. Visit our website or contact our admission office for more details.

btech: The fee structure for B.Tech varies by specialization. Please visit our website for details.
B.Tech fees include tuition, hostel, and miscellaneous charges.
mtech: M.Tech fees depend on the specialization and include tuition, lab, and hostel charges.
The M.Tech fee structure is available on our college website.
default: Fee details for all courses can be found on our official website.

library: Our library is well-equipped with thousands of books, journals, and digital resources.
BFCET's library provides a quiet and resourceful environment for students.
gym: We have a modern gym with professional trainers for student fitness.
The campus gym is open for students from 6 AM to 9 PM.
cafeteria: Our cafeteria offers a variety of meals and snacks at affordable prices.
The BFCET cafeteria serves hygienic and tasty food for students and staff.
default: Our campus has excellent facilities including a library, gym, cafeteria, and student lounges.
